title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant autumn scent
review: Yankee Candles' original large jar candles are my favorites. I like to set seasonal fragrances on the coffee table and enjoy their ambiance and scent to help set the seasonal mood. This spiced pumpkin candle offers a very pleasing autumnal blend of spices that sets the tone for fall, Halloween, and into the Thanksgiving season.Yankee Candle claims a burn time of 100 to 150 hours for these candles. It's difficult for me to verify that, but I can say that I have burned these large jar candles for 3 to 4 seasons, packing them away in gallon-sized zip lock bags to preserve their scents. There's lots of candle entries out there competing for your dollars, but I've found Yankee Candles to offer the best value and best scents. If you keep an eye out for particular scents on Amazon, you can find the original large jars for for $14 to $18, rather than the recent $25 to $40 prices.
country_date: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on October 10, 2022

The 22 oz jar is the standard large jar. I've only burned it once so far, but the wick lights well and the wax burns well. I expect this candle will last all season this year, and maybe next year too.

title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Usually love to order from Yankee candle.

This is the first time it is ever happened to me in years that I have been purchasing solely Yankee candles.*UPDATE*My second candle came in in the same condition!!! For some reason if you purchase two of the same items you can only leave one review…SOOO, I added onto this review to make you aware!!! Maybe we all need to start shopping for our candles in the stores for our holiday gifts. You will be able to see both candles. And all the bubbles on the tops of them and air pockets on the sides and bottoms somewhere very large. I could never give either of these candles as a gift. Bonus me I guess

title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Mine was not a strong scent
review: The candle I received did not have a strong scent to it. I returned it. For more sensitive people it might be fine because it’s not strong. Maybe I just got a bad one because usually Yankee candles are very good. I would not buy this scent again.
country_date: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on September 22, 2022

title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great coming out of the gate, but not much for stamina
review: This candle had a pleasant scent but no matter how short the wick was trimmed, it burned quickly and left the wick long and caused it to leave soot around the rim of the jar. It also smelled very waxy after just a couple of hours of being lit. I had to keep blowing it out, letting it cool completely, re-trim the wick every 2 hours to get the same fresh candle smell. I used to love Yankee Candles...idk what changed but they need to fix it.
country_date: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on September 21, 2022

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells amazing and last long
review: I love it so much it smells amazing.
country_date: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on September 21, 2022
